Parameters

logLevel (Optional)
Type: Rock.LoggingLogLevel
The log level that loggers returned from this instance's GetTLogger(String) method will be configured to.
supplementaryContainer (Optional)
Type: Rock.DependencyInjectionIResolver

An optional supplementary container.

If a constructor of the type specified by the generic parameter of the GetTLogger(String) method requires additional dependencies beyond those provided by SimpleLoggerFactoryTLogProvider, an implementation of IResolver that *can* resolve those dependencies should be specified here.
